# INIntegerResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for an integer value associated with an intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INIntegerResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntegerResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving integer-based parameters of an intent object. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter.

For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## Numerical Values

- **INDoubleResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a double value associated with an intent.
- **INBooleanResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a Boolean value associated with an intent.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
